name: lyra2

scripts.fetch-lyra2-source: mkdirp lib; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Lyra2.c > lib/Lyra2.c; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Lyra2.h > lib/Lyra2.h; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Sponge.h > lib/Sponge.h; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Sponge.c > lib/Sponge.c

readme:
# node-lyra2

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/abrkn/node-lyra2.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/abrkn/node-lyra2)

Lyra2 addon for Node.js

## Installing

```bash
npm install lyra2
```

## Testing

```bash
npm test
```

## Author

Andreas Brekken <andreas@brekken.com>
